citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The unaffiliated member of the IACUC has not participated in IACUC meetings or functions since December 2022. She
has not been present for program review nor facility inspections. The unaffiliated member is intended to represent general
community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals used in research. Correct by ensuring the attendance
and participation of a duly appointed unaffiliated member of the community for all IACUC activities from this day (4/12/24)
forward.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
In 2023, the IACUC submitted their semi-annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) on Oct 1st, stating that no
deficiencies were found in the program but the facility inspection was not conducted until Oct 26th. In the report dated Oct
1, they state that a facility inspection will be conducted later in the month but no addendum was submitted to the IO after
the inspection was completed. Without a complete report of IACUC findings, the IO cannot be assured of animal welfare
and regulatory compliance. The IACUC must prepare reports based on its semi-annual evaluations of the program and
the facilities and submit the reports to the IO. Correct by making timely full and complete reports to the IO by the next
semi-annual review by Oct 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC representative.

2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
In 2023, the IACUC submitted their semi-annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) on Oct 1st, stating that no 
deficiencies were found in the program but the facility inspection was not conducted until Oct 26th. In the report dated Oct 
1, they state that a facility inspection will be conducted later in the month but no addendum was submitted to the IO after 
the inspection was completed. Without a complete report of IACUC findings, the IO cannot be assured of animal welfare 
and regulatory compliance. The IACUC must prepare reports based on its semi-annual evaluations of the program and 
the facilities and submit the reports to the IO. Correct by making timely full and complete reports to the IO by the next 
semi-annual review by Oct 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC representative.
